title: Fashion. Fat. France

description: Episode number 1 of Series "Absolutely fabulous". Three hilarious episodes from the smash hit comedy series, "Absolutely Fabulous". "Fashion": Edwina is organising a celebrity fashion show. Once the ecstacy tablet kicks in it is all mayhem and disaster. "Fat": Edwina is horrified that an old friend, Penny "the stick" Caspar is going to pay her a visit. With Patsy's help she attempts to lose some weight fast. "France": Edwina and Patsy pay a visit to the French countryside, scaring the horse, the locals, and anything else they come in contact with. The usual mixture of high camp, drug and alcohol-tinged exaggerated theatrics and wonderful writing. Co-written by Dawn French. With Jennifer Saunders and Joanna Lumley.
